attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that Newton Faulkner should be giver a nighthood because he is a great singer/song writer. He also has ginger hair and dreadlocks.... and he pulls it off not many people can do it. He can because he is awesome. these are only some reasons for him to be nighted. Please support our Campaign.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
